messages.subject: Anyone in the Tulsa OK area?
messages.msgSnippet: I have a very dear friend whose daughter was just suspended from school for the rest of the year.  It s a long story but is wrapped up in some very oogey
messages.messageBody:
I have a very dear friend whose daughter was just suspended from
school for the rest of the year. It's a long story but is wrapped
up in some very oogey thought patterns by the school administration
and security (like not being able to recognize metaphors!) Anyway,
the school now considers them "homeschooled" and I would love to
find a good supportive non-judgemental group (or family) for them to
be involved with in the Tulsa area (they actually live in Jenks). I
really think her dd would be fantastic as an unschooler. She has a
wonderfully creative mind and is very expressive. She just has a
problem with authority ;-)

Michelle
